title: The Lucky years

abstract: Brian Luscombe talks about what it was like to serve in World War II
description: Brian Luscombe enlisted in the Air Force on Australia Day 1942. He was 18 and wanted to be a pilot. Dubbed Lucky Luscombe, Brian talks about his years as a pilot in the RAAF in World War II
